data.title: Infographics - White Victims of Black Crime
data.meta_description:
Since the thread I was posting to is going to hit the bump limit, and because this deserves its own thread, I have started this thread to share the infographics that I have created/am creating to document the many incidents of Black on White crime.

I will be reposting the ones from the last thread, as well as adding the new ones I'm currently creating. I will be creating archives for every 125 infographics I create.

An archive of Infographics 1 - 125
http://www21.zippyshare.com/v/ip7Le2SZ/file.html

An archive of Infographics 126 - 250
http://www98.zippyshare.com/v/RnjRUfHa/file.html

Some of the cases I do infographics aren't closed, so they will be updated as they progress. One of which, I'm including with this initial post.

And if you think that case is bad, just keep reading. This thread will likely make you rage.


Holla Forums
data.text:
Since the thread I was posting to is going to hit the bump limit, and because this deserves its own thread, I have started this thread to share the infographics that I have created/am creating to document the many incidents of Black on White crime.

I will be reposting the ones from the last thread, as well as adding the new ones I'm currently creating. I will be creating archives for every 125 infographics I create.

An archive of Infographics 1 - 125

www21.zippyshare.com /v /ip7Le2SZ /file.html

An archive of Infographics 126 - 250

www98.zippyshare.com /v /RnjRUfHa /file.html

Some of the cases I do infographics aren't closed, so they will be updated as they progress. One of which, I'm including with this initial post.

And if you think that case is bad, just keep reading. This thread will likely make you rage.

I've seen commies on Holla Forums say that white people commit more overall crime. They don't understand or see the world like we do, user. If statistics are beyond them or they go heaven and beyond to deny their legitimacy, then all I can say is that they have to be baptised by fire. They never have a come back when you try to tell them to go live in Detroit and see how much niggers sympathize with class rather than race. The approach to get to them has to be different. Also for future reference, many older infographics are not sourced/sources have been removed. That needs attention. This is a problem because leftists like to nitpick things like that and it ruins efficiency. Not like they read them anyway, but it's best not to give them an argument.

Yes, those graphics are what helped to inspire me to create my infographics. I wanted more detail and to focus on a case, by case basis.

0255

—————-

January 8, 2015

Victim(s): Stephanie Michele Waters 21

Attacker(s): Deauntay Dontaz Moye 16, Ryan James Hardwick 15

Description: Stephanie’s boyfriend Benjamin (white) sent her to handle the drug deal he had setup with Moye & Hardwick. Stephanie drove to meet with the two who, after examining the $250 worth of marijuana for sale, robbed her, with Moye shooting Stephanie in the neck, then the head, before Hardwick shot her dog Duke. Stephanie’s body was tossed into the back seat before the two drove her car around smoking marijuana as she lay bleeding to death for about 20 minutes before dying. They slept at Moye’s house for the night before disposing of her car the next day.

Moye then pulled out the gun and shot her in the neck. A few seconds later, he shot her a second time – in the head. One of the teens then shot the dog – however, it has not yet been determined who actually fired the shots into the dog. They then tossed Stephanie’s body into the back seat of the vehicle and Moye drove her car to the Altoona area where they drove around smoking weed.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /74RcO Moye & Hardwick are charged.

archive.is /mW4XM Another story on the crime.

archive.is /6HHEF The case moves forward against Moye & Hardwick, as well as Stephanie’s boyfriend Benjamin Holsinger for supplying the marijuana.

archive.is /ziLPn Moye gets 60 years to life after pleading guilty to several charges 12-2016. Hardwick pleaded guilty earlier in May and got the same sentence.

archive.is /gL3K3 Another story on the sentencing.

archive.is /m11Pd Stephanie’s boyfriend pleads guilty to drug charges & faces up to a year in prison.

archive.is /Z0wIw Stephanie’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

0259

—————-

January 7, 2015

Victim(s): Carolyn Flagg Temple 69

Attacker(s): Antreal Jyjuan Jones 17, Gerome Moore 17, Antwain Dukes 17

Description: The three were on a crime spree where they robbed people and beat them up, before coming across Carolyn bringing up the garbage cans to her boyfriend’s home. They decided to rob her, hitting her in the head with the butt of the gun, before shooting her in the stomach. She died a few days later at the hospital.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /SRNmt Carolyn dies from her injuries.

archive.is /iE1uH Carolyn’s family reacts to the arrests of the suspects. Moore’s mother defends her son, saying: "My son ain't gonna shoot no gun. Now I ain't saying he won't rob nobody but I know he won't shoot no gun. He not gonna shoot nobody."

archive.is /JRBpy Dukes pleads guilty and gets 25 years (multiple sentences to be served concurrently), though the media pretends that they need to be served back to back and puts 70 years.

archive.is /L7aHF Moore gets life. Jones still awaiting trial.

archive.is /tju15 Carolyn’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

0280

—————-

March 12, 2015

Victim(s): James Patrick Stuhlman 51

Attacker(s): Brandon Smith 15, Tyfine Hamilton 15, Alston Zou-Rutherford 14

Description: The three were playing basketball when they decided to rob someone. After initially decided on one target, they switched to James when they noticed he was older and was walking a less intimidating breed of dog. They approached James and announced their intention to rob him. He begged multiple times for them not to shoot, but Hamilton shot him once in the chest anyway. The three ran off without taking anything from James. He was found with his dog by his side and taken to the hospital, where he was pronounced dead.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /S2YHo Story on the crime. Normally James walked the dog with his daughter by his side, but decided to go alone that night.

archive.is /wOAVn Hamilton gets 25 – 80 years in a plea deal.

archive.is /hhn5v Smith is convicted and faces 30 years to life. Zou-Rutherford was sentenced as a juvenile to incarceration until he turns 21.

archive.is /YoLyu James’ find a grave memorial.

—————-

0293

—————-

March 10, 2015

Victim(s): Joshua R. Richey 38

Attacker(s): Damarious Thompson, Shontavious Chestnut

Description: Joshua noticed someone inside his work pickup and walked up to investitavistock. Joshua approached the vehicle and confronted Thompson, who shot him from inside the vehicle, before fleeing in a car driven by Chestnut. Joshua’s coworker attempted to get a license plate number, then performed CPR until help arrived. The Kroger’s that owns the parking lot where the incident took place is known as “Murder Kroger”.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /dLaI2 Report on the crime.

archive.is /rqucA Thompson had been released from prison only 3 days before the murder. He was arrested while eating lunch at Popeye’s without incident.

archive.is /okneV Thompson and Chestnut are convicted.

archive.is /3JZ0Z Thompson gets life + 40 years, while Chestnut’s sentence was not released.

archive.is /89jOh Joshua’s widow talks about her loss - “He was my world”.

—————-

Fresno,CA 2013 - I shall check my sources. I'm currently on cases that made the news in 2015 - which includes crimes that happened in prior years. If you know of any details at all besides the aforementioned information, please post it year. I'll see what I can find with what info you've given me in the next few days.

Once I reach 1001, I'll look into making a book. White Victims of Black Crime - Volume I

I'm sure he would have raped her corpse, had he had the opportunity.

0024 - Jane Pepper - He raped her corpse after he stabbed her to death.

0043 - Lauren Anne Deis - He raped her, killed her. He then tried to cut off her leg to stuff in a container. Failing that (a nigger failing, imagine that!), he stored her body in his basement closet for about a week. During that time, he continued to rape her corpse.

Your mom isn't even a 2, jew.

0308

—————-

June 5, 2014

Victim(s): Joshua Daniel Tucker 31

Attacker(s): Albert Rogers

Description: Joshua got into an argument with Rogers, his neighbor, over Rogers firing his gun at Joshua’s dog with Joshua’s girlfriend’s 2 year old son standing nearby because he “felt threatened”. Rogers pulled out his gun and fired 10 shots at Joshua, fatally striking him in the back.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /HKmVP Story on the crime.

archive.is /XKY0B Rogers pleads guilty to aggravated battery. He was sentenced to 10 years in community corrections and 1 year probation. He will not spend any time in prison.

archive.is /Uh4xf Joshua’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

0326

—————-

August 18, 2009

Victim(s): Mary Alice Wilkes Stutts 75

Attacker(s): Damian Inman, Lorenzo Inman, John Henry Bridges 16

Description: The trio went to Mary’s house under the guise of needing a glass of water because of the heat outside. When she went to hand them the glass, she was struck with a pistol,beaten, then kidnapped; being stuffed into the truck of her own car, turning up the speakers to muffle her cries for help. The trio attempted to sell her car, with her in it, to a scrap yard, who refused because they didn’t have the paperwork. They then drove to a dirt road, opened the truck, shot her multiple times, then dumped her body on the road, then went to school as usual.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /RCHCp Damian Inman is sentenced to life + 80 years. Lorenzo Inman was sentenced to life + 40 years, and Bridges was sentenced to 40 years.

archive.is /rpGxr Damian Inman gets a new trial because of a procedural error 6-2014.

archive.is /PHCRK Damian Inman is found guilty again. He is sentenced to 30 years on everything but the kidnapping/murder charges. He spits at the court after the verdict is read.

archive.is /9OU9h Mary’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

I have a database I am working on that will have plenty of details of crimes. Once it is completed, I will release it in several forms (.csv for the timid) so that people can study the numbers if they wish. This will be after I get to 1001. Still some time to go. I have roughly 30 icogman collages to go through before I'll be caught up. I imagine I'll be well into the 700 - 800's by then.

Yeah, I got a chuckle out of that one as well. It's nice when we don't have to pay for a trial and free room & board for life.

It's only a matter of time. I find that projects such as these, tend to inspire others.

0332

—————-

June 21, 2014

Victim(s): LCpl Jonathan Thomas Price 26, Megan Price 24 (survived)

Attacker(s): Quincinio D. Canada, Dawan Q. Mulazim

Description: Jonathan and his wife Megan were at the Austin City Saloon celebrating her 24th birthday, when Canada and Mulazim tried to rob them. During the confrontation, the prices were both shot. Megan was shot in the leg and survived. Jonathan, however, was shot in the back and died.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /FaPim Story on the crime.

archive.is /f9EXX The pair are indicted 6-2015.

archive.is /I1GJV The pair will not be tried for all of the cases of robbery against them at once. Some will be tried separately.

archive.is /fnXyw Judge refuses to toss two witness ID’s.

archive.is /L1bYn Jonathan’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

OP, these are incredible. A couple of thoughts.

1) A mega link where one could get the whole set in one click - this would make it much easier to disseminate them. If you can do this, I'll see if I have any luck reformatting them as I mention below.

2) If they were formatted 1800x1200 they would be the perfect dimensions to print at 300 dpi on post cards. 3300x2550 would be ideal for posters. It would be possible then for anons to print them and anonymously mail them to targets around the country - say, perhaps, everyone living in a particular zip code. This is a great way to bring the reality of diversity right into the faces of rich white liberals, who will look at these pictures and see their son or daughter. I also have some ideas for how to get bulk printing done, but don't want to promise anything. To my knowledge, it would be legal to send these through the mail. They also look quite good in greyscale if one wants to cut down on printing costs.

3) If anyone else goes with the post cards, on the obverse they need a catchy slogan. I like: "End White Silence - Stop Black Violence". Ideally, a website can be set up with a bunch of redpills available.

Either way, you've done incredible work here.

I might eventually do different sizes, but I'm sticking with 1024X768 for the time being. Thanks for the heads up on sizing. The way I'll be printing out the ones I post, is with a used inkjet printer from a local thrift store.

Another distribution method I was thinking of, was to print these out and slip them into newspapers so they'll fall out when it's unrolled, then deliver them to white neighborhoods.

Thank you for your praise and your input concerning my work. My images have gotten better thanks to various people making suggestions.

0364

—————-

May 4, 2015

Victim(s): Charles Ferrell 51

Attacker(s): Marshall Harris

Description: Harris, a cocaine addict and convicted felon, beat Charles to death with an old-style (CRT) television, a glass jug, and also stomped on his chest. He bragged to others about what he had done.

Archive.is Link(s):

web.archive.org /web /20170811170054 /https: / /patch.com /florida /clearwater /man-bragged-killing-another-cops-say-0 Harris is arrested. He bragged to others about what he done

—————-

If you do black and white printouts, you can tape over the yellow print head to block the dots as well. Be sure the printer does not have access to your network or any WiFi capabilities.

The newspapers are a good idea, but unless you were a newspaper roller, it'd be hard to get them into the paper. If you were, you'd be easily traced.

I like postcards because they are highly targetable, easy to do undetectably, and aren't terribly expensive. The other thing I was thinking was to set up a bitcoin address where anons who couldn't do post cards themselves could send enough money to cover the printing and mailing plus a list of addresses. It'd be better to have more people doing it, of course, but anything that can help the scale is a good idea.

I would have started at #500, personally…I always liked that trick the NSDAP used. Not that there won't be enough anyway, but if someone gets 0001 they won't realize the scale of the problem.

I meant those free papers you can access in major cities. Grab a bunch of those.

I thought about using bitcoin in some fashion, but that's still down the road. I honestly feel that the graphics themselves will inspire people to print them out once they go viral.

I prefer to stick to the truth with regards to numbers, as anything that's technically not true, can be used against us/the message. I will be at #500, likely by sometime in September, and then infographic #5XX is backed by 500+ actual previous graphics. I understand the logic behind your approach, but I prefer mine.

0365

—————-

July 5, 2015

Victim(s): John David Hester Sr. 68

Attacker(s): Adrian Lyryan Robinson, Brandon Quanterrious “Brad” Wynn, Christian Savion Glover, Derrick Demond Phillips, I-Key Tumazs Pinkins, Ty’Cameron La’Darius Hayes, Tykerious Raheem “Grump” Jones 17

Description: The group was breaking into homes when they decided to break into the home of John’s son, John Hester Jr., across the road from his own home. John noticed what they were doing and confronted them with a shotgun, firing a warning shot. The teens responded by shooting him in the leg. He managed to get back to his home and to the hospital, but died the next day.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /j82ah The seven “teens” are arrested.

archive.is /BH15l Recap of the story with more details.

archive.is /SemZI Hayes, Phillips, Wynn, and Pinkins were sentenced to 18 years w/4 years probation. Robinson was sentenced to 10 years. Jones and Glover were sentenced to 20 years.

archive.is /W2eEi John’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

That's some nigger name overload.

I played with formatting a bit. It looks like if you scale them to 1600x1200 you get minimal loss of quality and retain the same original dimensional ratio, but get an image that fits in 5.33x4" at 300 DPI. I might try to put a bunch together in this format later for convenience. That means you can fit 4 of them on an 8.5x11 sheet with sufficient margins for the printer. They should still be large and clear enough to be readable, and they're in a size that qualifies for the USPS definition of a postcard if they are printed on card stock that is .007"-.016" thick. Post cards are not legally required to have a return address and can be sent through any blue mailbox with the proper stamp. Stamps are $0.34 each. 65 lb paper that should meet the USPS specifications is $11 for a pack of 250 sheets, which would yield 1,000 "postcards."

Unfortunately the stamps make the postcard route fairly expensive, I estimate it would be ~$400/1000 postcards sent when you total in stamps, paper, ink, and gas to drive to somewhere a long ways away from your house to drop them off at the mailbox. It is, however, the easiest to target effectively. The people I think these would have the most effect on are the upper middle class cuckservatives. They donate money to "right wing" candidates, and so they have the most ability to influence the total shift to the right by funding pro white candidates instead of the neocon trash.

OP, do you have any restrictions on how you want people to use your work? Would it be acceptable to you to have someone solicit donations while mailing these out to help defray the costs?

Also please if you can upload these in a batch to your favorite upload site. The easier it is for people to get them the easier to spread them.

Side note: Do not put these directly into mailboxes, that is a federal crime. Putting them on car windshields varies by jurisdiction - know your local laws!

Damn, I forgot to bold that.

Yeah. The earlier case: 0078 - Erik Richard Tornblom, who was executed by blacks, only to have his killer have his own life spared by a black judge 20+ later, is a prime example.

I use LibreOffice Writer to write up the individual case files.

I use LibreOffice Calc to make additions to a spreadsheet with info such as: Case#, FirstNameLast, MDY of the crime, City/State, If they survived. This will be imported into LibreOffice Base at a later date. I plan on releasing this info, at least as a .csv, sometime down the road.

I use QtQR to create the QR codes.

I use Shutter to take screenshots of pictures that every browser I try (Palemoon, Chromium, FireFox, Slimjet) fails to let me save. This also allows me to take screenshots of videos that I can't manage to save via browser plugins.

I use VLC & SMPlayer to take screenshots of suspects and victims if I can't get good pictures elsewhere.

I use Parcellite to juggle all of the links and other data that I find myself copying/pasting back and forth. There are other clipboard managers for Linux, but that's what I'm currently using.

I use The Gimp to create the graphics.

I use Clementine to tune into SomaFM - Underground 80's. I find music helps.

I use Tor to upload archives and to access sites like Jewgle.

0387

—————-

October 14, 2015

Victim(s): William Franklin "Billy" Dougherty III 33

Attacker(s): Warren Price, Darion Harris

Description: The pair broke into William’s home and shot him, before burglarizing the place. He managed to get to a hospital, but died the following day after surgery for his wounds.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /GGRac The pair are on the run.

archive.is /zx7Od Both are arrested.

archive.is /rOhRn William’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

I start with the name of the victim(s). If I can locate one news story, I'll find the name of at least one suspect, then add that to the mix. Frequent name misspellings (victim & attacker) in reports, especially with niggers names being retarded to begin with, can make searches difficult. Find a grave is usual for finding out the victim's full name if one can't get it elsewhere. This can aid searching, as I find news organizations will use multiple versions (e.g.:with and without middle initial/full middle name) of names in its reports. Hope this helps.

0388

—————-

August 28, 2015

Victim(s): Henry Arthur Sawyer 89

Attacker(s): Kristin Minor

Description: Henry answered the knock on his door, expecting it to be his Meals on Wheels delivery. Instead, Minor forced her way in and beat him, then stole the cash he had on him, and some groceries from his house. The real Meals on Wheels

driver found him and called for an ambulance. Henry died a few days later, on September 2,2015.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /SEa0i Minor is charged.

archive.is /V4S6J Henry’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

Actually, I would prefer if people concentrate on distribution and projects like . It's a question, IMO, of too many cooks in the kitchen.

Obviously I can't stop anybody from pursuing the path that they wish to take, but things like printing these up and handing them out/posting in public places, is something that will prove very useful, as these images are useless if nobody sees them. We need to get these physically posted in as many different regions as possible.

Nice work. Video is a very powerful medium, which is why Youtube is "shutting it down" on so many people. They're scared. They should be.

You're welcome. Thank you for whatever you can do to help spread these - It is appreciated.

0393

—————-

November 26, 2015

Victim(s): Ryan Kelly 21

Attacker(s): Keenan Glenn, David Ramos Jr.

Description: Ryan was walking along the street, when Glenn and Ramos pulled up in a stolen car and attempted to rob him. When he refused, he was shot in the chest.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /DZrn2 Arrests are made.

archive.is /P7pwm The pair are charged.

archive.is /DY9jP Glenn pleads guilty. Ramos’ trial is scheduled for 4-2018. Glenn’s sentence of 20 – 40 years depends on his “fulfilling the terms of his agreement”.

—————-

I should mention that I decided to correct that once I get to 1001 images and see about getting a coffee table book printed. I will make a new version of the top, export the image, then use some automation to replace the tops of all the graphics with the new one. I just don't want to make the change now. Also, the new version will be noticeable in videos like this magnificent example. I'd rather my work be ausitically-triggering, than to have things like that appear in other people's projects. Once I make the new top, I will start using that for new graphics as well as the reissues (complete with new .7z archives).

Not sure if that was a question or not, but if it was: please upload my infographics wherever you get the chance. I'm not sure how long they'll last. Reddit is a SJW safe space. Please screencap your results.

Actually, he was a drug addict who was killed and raped by a nigger. I haven't read any proof that says the victim was a homosexual - Having your corpse raped by one doesn't count. Regardless, the point of this case, is that the nigger was in a position of trust. He gave an addict drugs, then killed him when the drugs weren't strong enough to make him a sexual degenerate. Then he raped his corpse.

0402

—————-

June 15, 2008

Victim(s): Beau R. Zabel 23

Attacker(s): Marcellus Jones, Tyrek Taylor

Description: Beau was walking home from his job at Starbucks when Jones, in a vehicle driven by Taylor, snuck up behind him. Jones got out and shot Beau in the back of the neck, then stole his iPod, before jumping back in the car.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /79XeW Jones is acquitted of murder. He is already serving a life sentence for the murder of Taylor, who was the only witness to the crime.

archive.is /ABteD Beau’s find a grave memorial.

—————-

Honest question, Holla Forums

I'm an artist with a 9-5 job which I'll be quitting in a few months in order to move and get back into freelancing. I thought about this today. What if I make a series of drawing and paintings of each white person killed by a black person this year? I love doing portraits and I could probably finish one every day or two if I stay focused. I would present the series as "Racial Crime in America" or something like that, without saying exactly that I'm focusing on white victims specifically. People would look, since racial things are a hot topic now, and see all of the victims the media glossed over. If anyone tries to pull the racism card on me and dox me, I won't have a job to get fired from and I'll be moving anyways. I think I could seriously garner attention to this problem in our society and whitepill a bunch of people, as long as I present it in the correct way, which I must figure out. Does this seem like a good idea? One thing I fear is being pegged as "that racist artist" and getting blacklisted or something, because once I step out and do this, there's no going back.

It's a great idea. However IMO, you should pretty much resign yourself to being part of a different group other than artists, as even people who even slightly step out of the groupthink are attacked. You still are an artist of course, but you'll have to carve out your own path. I'm not saying you can't pull it off, but just "prepare for the worst, hope for the best".

Do you have any examples? How about taking one of the child victims of my graphics and doing one based on that? Children often elicit the most intense emotional responses in people - Especially given the subject matter.

Thank you for your input, and I look forward to seeing what you can do.

Checked. Good point.

0414

—————-

November 7, 2015

Victim(s): Justin Niles Wright 31

Attacker(s): Brandon Lamar Cooper

Description: Cooper broke into Justin’s house through a back door and shot him in the upper body. He was pronounced dead at the scene.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /BxZne Story on the crime.

archive.is /UsIVc Cooper is charged.

archive.is /paw2x Cooper is sentenced to 19 ½ years. He will be paroled after 13 years, with 10 years on supervised release.

—————-

0415

—————-

December 7, 2015

Victim(s): Robert Ponsi 29

Attacker(s): Daquan Middleton 16, Antwan Eldridge 17, Prince Greene 15, other “juveniles”

Description: Robert was riding his bike home from work when he was surrounded by Eldridge, Middleton, and other “juveniles”. They attacked him, though he tried using his bike to beat them off, he was still knocked to the ground. Once down, he was kicked, stomped, and stabbed.

The group took his belongings, including his bike, then fled the scene. Police found him lying on the sidewalk with knife wounds to his neck and chest. He was taken to the hospital where he died.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /os5oP Story on the crime.

archive.is /o5IMt The pair are convicted of 1st degree assault and robbery, but acquitted of murder in a bench trial. One of the “juveniles” is said to responsible for the stabbing, which killed Robert. Because of his age, his case was transferred to juvenile court, and those proceedings are sealed.

archive.is /yFzKZ Motion to transfer Eldridge and Middleton to the juvenile system was denied. Eldridge was sentenced to 8 years. Suspended all but 5 years, with 5 years probation. Middleton was given 13 years, with 4 additional years suspended, and 5 years of probation. The state’s recommendation was 55 years for each defendant. Greene’s (son of a prominent Baltimore civil rights activist) fate is unknown.

—————-

Yes. Those are the ones that should be used for the posters/T-shirts

0439

—————-

February 4, 2016

Victim(s): Trey Collins 19 (survived)

Attacker(s): Termedric Faust, Christopher Akilnyay Burnett 16

Description: Trey, just two weeks into his new job, went to make a Papa John’s pizza delivery, when he was kidnapped at gunpoint by Faust and Burnett, who forced him into the trunk of his own car. They drove for about 10 minutes, before firing 10 times into the back seat while he was still trapped inside the trunk. His attackers got away with the pizzas, his cellphone, and $80 cash. Trey survived the ordeal, as all 4 bullets that hit him, missed his vital organs. Two of the bullets will have to remain in his body, as it’s too risky to remove them.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /ocv85 Story on the crime and an interview with Trey.

archive.is /fhxnV The pair are indicted for attempted murder.

—————-

I converted the mp4 to webm so I could include it. Enjoy one of our brothers NOT dying.

If you want to really make this flawless in the eyes of academics (in other words, really make people take this seriously) I can suggest some changes to the video.

1. When quoting sources (well I am just talking about the link at the beginning of the video), make sure that you use proper academic format of citation, such as the chicago format. Never post stand alone links as they are always subjected to change. If you can, cite journals that have been written and published. And place more than one source in order to fortify the strength of the argument.

Example.

NIGGA, T "Dindu Nuffin… Overstating, Deceiving and Overreacting like a Nigger for beginners" p. Marxism approved books, Print, 1984 pg 69

2. Make sure you introduce the 'Nigger in the hood' picture as a placeholder image, idiot-proofing it, to make it is completely obvious to onlookers that there is no picture available. People will scrutinize even the most trivial of things in order to defend their beliefs that niggers are sweet innocent creatures that are misunderstood.

3. Make sure it is relevant to the here and now, any crimes older than 20 years will be seen as a superfluous approach to bulster the statement, this will really backfire.

4. Remove any crimes that involve Spics/Whites as perps, this again will be scrutinized as a cheap way to bulster the statement. There are PLENTY of crimes commited by 100% pure nigger here, don't dilute it!

5. Maybe highlight the most disgusting cases, knowing how Niggers really have no sense of mercy it will be tempting to highlight 70-80% of the crimes, but keep them low such as murders and rapes of elderly or young children.

Anyway keep up the good work, we need to make a case to everyone that Blacks are the ones at fault and not us.

0105

—————-

November 3, 1980

Victim(s): Alfred J Koll (age unknown)

Attacker(s): Prentice Juan Snow

Description: Prentice Snow was sentenced to death on 08/31/1982 for the murder of Alfred J. Koll. Prentice Juan Snow was resentenced in 1990 in Los Angeles County Superior Court of the first degree murder of Alfred J. Koll. The jury also sustained a special circumstance allegation that Snow intentionally killed Alfred to prevent his testimony in another criminal proceeding.

On August 27, 1979, two men robbed Alfred of cash at his pharmacy, located at 939 East Walnut Street in Pasadena. Snow and James Phillips were charged with the robbery and with felony assault. At the preliminary examination, Alfred identified Snow as one of the robbers.

On November 3, 1980, the robbery case was scheduled for trial in a department of the Los Angeles County Superior Court located in the Pasadena courthouse. Alfred had been subpoenaed as a witness and was on call if needed. During the morning session, before court and counsel started to select a jury, the prosecutor, Gerald Haney, and defense counsel, Adolfo Lara, discussed a disposition by plea. Haney offered to drop the assault charge if defendant pled guilty to robbery. According to Haney, Lara left the room to talk to defendant. Snow wanted to wait until after the lunch break to think it over. During the lunch break Snow, dressed in a motorcycle helmet and denim jacket, walked a short distance from the courthouse to Alfred's Pharmacy and shot him to death.

Archive.is Link(s):

archive.is /CTITr Death sentence upheld.

archive.is /VMPCz Crime & Punishment thread.

archive.is /G1kb8 Case history – Still appealing.

archive.is /FcXL0 More death penalty info.

archive.fo /28Vq8 More details about the initial robbery and the murder of Alfred.

I finally got his picture. I will update the archives at the end of the month, as I have other old cases to look up later on.

I start off with the name(s) of the deceased. e.g.: Jane Smith murder

Once I get a matching story, which depends on how unique the victim's name is for one, I look at the story and try to get at least one suspect name.

I then search again, e.g.: Jane Smith Tyrone Niggerly

From there, one can usually get stories on various court proceedings. Depending on when the crime occurred, and how unique a nigger name the suspect(s) has/have, you might get a lot of hits, or only a few.

I use DuckDuckGo for all of my searches. (Jewgle/Bing/Yahoo/etc via Tor if necessary)

I open & view multiple news stories to increase my chances of finding pictures of the victim(s) & suspect(s).

I use secure.findagrave.com / to locate victim memorials. This is also a good way to obtain their full name(s).

An example of the folder structure for a future case #999 is:

OC White Victims of Black Crime/0999/

White Victims of Black Crime - 0999 - FirstName LastName.odt (Libre Office Writer)

White Victims of Black Crime - 0999 - FirstName LastName.xcf (The Gimp)

Pictures of victim(s)

Pictures of suspect(s)

Video files

''''

Each case folder contains ALL of the files associated with that case.

January 6, 2007

Victim(s): Channon Gail Christian 21, Hugh Christopher Newsom, Jr. 23.

Attacker(s): Letalvis D. Cobbins, Lemaricus D. Davidson, George Thomas, Eric Boyd, Vanessa Coleman

Description: Channon & Chris were carjacked near Knoxville Center Mall & Washington Ridge Apt complex. They were taken 3 miles away to Chipman street where Chris was tortured & sodomized before being shot & set on fire.

Channon was sexually tortured for days, bleach poured over/in her to hide evidence. Hog-tied, her face was wrapped in a plastic bag, and was placed in a large trash can, where she slowly suffocated to death.

According to news reports, Christian and Newsom had gone on a date at a local restaurant on Saturday, January 6, 2007, but did not return home. During their night out, the couple were carjacked, bound and blindfolded by three males, and "taken back to Lemaricus Devall 'Slim' Davidson's rented house on Chipman Street."[6]

Christian's parents found her abandoned Toyota 4-Runner two blocks away from the Chipman Street house the following Monday with the help of her mobile phone provider. An envelope recovered from the vehicle yielded fingerprint evidence that led police to Lemaricus Davidson and 2316 Chipman Street. When police went to the address on Tuesday, January 9, they found the home unoccupied and Christian's body in a trash can in the kitchen.

According to the testimony of the Knox County Acting Medical Examiner Dr. Darinka Mileusnic-Polchan at the subsequent trial of Eric Boyd, Newsom was repeatedly sodomized with an object and then blindfolded, gagged, arms and feet bound and his head covered. Barefoot, he was either led or dragged outside the house to a set of nearby railroad tracks. He was shot in the back of the head, the neck, and the back, and his body then set on fire.

Channon's death came only after hours of sexual torture, medical examiner Mileusnic-Polchan testified. Channon suffered horrific injuries to her vagina, anus and mouth. She was not only raped but savaged with "an object," possibly a broken chair leg, the doctor testified. She was beaten in the head. Some type of chemical was poured down her throat, and her body, including her bleeding and battered genital area, likely scrubbed with the same solution - all while Channon was alive, the forensic expert said. She was then "hog-tied," with curtains and strips of bedding, her face covered tightly with a small trash bag and her body stashed inside five large trash bags before being placed inside a large trash can and covered with sheets. Channon died slowly, suffocating, the medical examiner said.

Lemaricus D. Davidson Sentenced to death.

Letalvis D. Cobbins Free room & board for life w/o parole.

Vanessa Coleman 35 yrs free room and board. Already eligible for parole, denied 2014. Next parole date is 2020

George Thomas Free room & board for life w/parole.

Eric Boyd 18 years. Will be released in October 2022.

This was written in the 1800's

Hinton Rowan Helper commissioned by the US Congress for a study on the possibility of Repatriation of American Blacks to Africa.

archive.org /details /negroesinnegrola00helpiala

Hinton Rowan Helper (December 27, 1829 – March 9, 1909) was an American Southern critic of slavery during the 1850s. In 1857, he published a book which he dedicated to the "nonslaveholding whites" of the South.

en.wikipedia.org /wiki /Hinton_Rowan_Helper

"The common food of the natives of Ansiko (former Bantu tribe) is men's flesh,

insomuch that their markets are provided with that, as ours in

Europe with beef or mutton : all prisoners of war, unless they can

sell them alive with greater advantage, otherwise, as we said,

they fatten them for slaughter, and at last sell them to the butchers.

To this savage barbarity they are so naturalized, that some slaves,

whether as weary of their lives, or to show their love to their

masters, will proffer themselves freely to be killed and eaten.

But that which is most inhuman, and beyond the ferocity of beasts,

is, that the father scruples not to eat his son, nor the son his father,

nor one brother the other, but take them by force, devouring their

flesh, the blood yet reeking hot between their teeth." Ogilby's

Africa, page 518. "

“Before they sit down to eat meat in company, the Kaffirs are very careful to immerse their hands in fresh cow-dung, wiping them on the grass, which is considered the perfection of cleanliness. Except an occasional plunge in a river, they never wash themselves, and consequently their bodies are covered with vermin.” — Steedman’s Africa, Vol. I, page 265

Hinton Helper was a famous prewar Southern Abolitionist and CRITIC of slavery and secession whose first book, The Impending Crisis of the South, was popularized by the Republican Party (anti Slavery Party). Africa opened his eyes.

To think, if we never had the niggers picking cotton they would have been eaten alive by their fellow niggers, as should be. Anyone have a time machine? We need to make sure slavery never happens and niggers get what they deserve.
